description: Data captured by an agent representing an event occurring in a monitored service

id.description: Hex encoded 128 random bits ID of the error.

trace_id.description: Hex encoded 128 random bits ID of the correlated trace. Must be present if transaction_id and parent_id are set.

transaction_id.description: Hex encoded 64 random bits ID of the correlated transaction. Must be present if trace_id and parent_id are set.

parent_id.description: Hex encoded 64 random bits ID of the parent transaction or span. Must be present if trace_id and transaction_id are set.
